title: So now that we have Ivern
body: Who else needs an Alolan form? Maokai's turned out to be a success.

replies.body:
I just think we should get a Treebeard now. 
We have a fat tree
and a spindly tree
now we need a tree master.

> [{quoted}](name=HadestheHandsome,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=H4WYMPGW,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-09-21T10:52:44.641+0000)
>
> I just think we should get a Treebeard now. 
> We have a fat tree
> and a spindly tree
> now we need a tree master.

I want a tree that throws big ass rocks and walk all over fucking Isengard n shit. We need more.
This could actually be legit tho. Riot be like : This is what happened to maokai when the blessed water in his hearthwood started to dry out.
The Pokemon reference on League boards... Most people don't get it lol.
Please look at my Summoner name.
Lol I know but I'm just saying many other people on League won't understand.
Idk, a lot of people enjoyed joking about the Alolan Exeggutor...
Pokemon is rather popular... It's a safe bet that many board goers at least follow it somewhat.

Glacial Rammus is a thing actually
